Errors.start1: Invalid Time Selection: The Start time cannot be less than 0. Please enter a valid value.
Errors.end1: Invalid Time Selection:  The 'End' value cannot be larger than the total length of the video. Please enter a valid value.
Errors.end2: Invalid Time Selection: The 'End' value cannot be 0 or less. Please enter a valid value.
Errors.end3: Invalid Time Selection:  The 'End' value cannot be equal or less than 'Start' value. Please enter a valid value.
Errors.step: Invalid Step Selection: The 'Step' parameter must be a integer greater than 1. Please enter a valid value.
Errors.required: All the fields are obligatory. Please check video range form.
Errors.formatInput: Incorrect format. 'Start' and 'End' values must be in '00.00' format.

Errors.required: All the fields are obligatory. Please check Pixel Size form.
Errors.lineLength: Invalid Line Length: The line length must be a positive number, which can include decimals. Please enter a valid value.
